country.country_description: Aldebaran is an advanced civilization on a distant planet, where technology has allowed for a utopian lifestyle.
country.people_description: The citizens of Aldebaran are highly intelligent, with an emphasis on both knowledge and physical prowess.
country.language_description: Dipthong is a complex language composed of multiple syllables, with an elaborate writing system.
